title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development 

(Exempted Development) (No. 4) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall be included in the collective citation Planning 

and Development Regulations 2001 to 2023. 

Amendment of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to Planning and Development 
Regulations 2001
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited planning development (exempted development) (no 4) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall included collective citation planning development regulation 2001 2023 amendment part 1 schedule 2 planning development regulation 2001

title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 2. Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Planning and Development Regulations 2001
text_raw:
2. Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Planning and Development Regulations 2001 
(S.I. No. 600 of 2001) (as amended by Regulation 2 of the Planning and 
Development (Exempted Development) (No. 4) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 605 
of 2022)) is amended by the substitution for the matter set out at CLASS 20F the 
following: 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 21st July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [376] 3
text_norm: 2 part 1 schedule 2 planning development regulation 2001 (s.i no 600 2001) (as amended regulation 2 planning development (exempted development) (no 4) regulation 2022 (s.i no 605 2022)) amended substitution matter set class 20f following notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 21st july 2023 376 3

title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 1. The temporary use shall
text_raw:
1. The temporary use shall 
only be for the purposes of 
accommodating displaced 
persons or for the purposes 
of accommodating persons 
seeking international 
protection.
text_norm: 1 temporary use shall purpose accommodating displaced person purpose accommodating person seeking international protection

title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 2. Subject to paragraph 4 of
text_raw:
2. Subject to paragraph 4 of 
this class, the use for the 
purposes of accommodating 
displaced persons shall be 
discontinued when the 
temporary protection 
introduced by the Council 
Implementing Decision 
(EU) 2022/382 of 4 March 
20221 comes to an end in 
accordance with Article 6 of 
the Council Directive 
2001/55/EC of 20 July
text_norm: 2 subject paragraph 4 class use purpose accommodating displaced person shall discontinued temporary protection introduced council implementing decision (eu) 2022 382 4 march 20221 come end accordance article 6 council directive 2001 55 ec 20 july

title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 3. The use for the purposes
text_raw:
3. The use for the purposes 
of accommodating persons 
seeking international 
protection shall be 
discontinued not later than 
31 December 2028.
text_norm: 3 use purpose accommodating person seeking international protection shall discontinued later 31 december 2028

text_raw:

provide temporary 
protection is discontinued in 
accordance with paragraph 
2 of this class, on a date that 
is earlier than 31 December 
2028, the temporary use of 
any structure which has

title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 5. The relevant local
text_raw:
5. The relevant local 
authority must be notified 
of locations where change 
of use is taking place prior 
the commencement of 
development.
text_norm: 5 relevant local authority must notified location change use taking place prior commencement development

title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 6. ‘displaced persons’, for
text_raw:
6. ‘displaced persons’, for 
the purpose of this class, 
means persons to whom 
temporary protection 
applies in accordance with 
Article 2 of Council 
Implementing Decision 
(EU) 2022/382 of 4 March
text_norm: 6 displaced person purpose class mean person temporary protection applies accordance article 2 council implementing decision (eu) 2022 382 4 march

title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 7. ‘international protection’,
text_raw:
7. ‘international protection’, 
for the purpose of this class, 
has the meaning given to it 
in section 2(1) of the 
International Protection Act 
2015 (No. 66 of 2015).
text_norm: 7 international protection purpose class meaning given section 2(1) international protection act 2015 (no 66 2015)

title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 8. ‘temporary protection’,
text_raw:
8. ‘temporary protection’, 
for the purpose of this class, 
has the meaning given to it 
in Article 2 of Council 
Directive 2001/55/EC of 20 
July 2001.”
